Tufts Health Plan

Aug 5, 2014

Commercial Claims Operations – Summer 2014

Handled confidential client information while working on company database. Performed claims processing functions on over 5,000 beneficiaries.

Constructed outdoor health and wellness center and assembled cubicles and desk spaces. Received an honorable mention in internal corporate newsletter for distinguished summer intern.
